Articles.Content:
I swear i'm not making this up.

 

I was with a friend, and we both looked like the Halo 3 Elites. We apparently were on the surface of Eve, and our cave base needed Kethane for reasons unexplained to me. I would go and mine Kethane and then come back, and there apparently was a good pocket about 4.5 kilometers away, so I would need to stay for a few days. I got the stuff for a base, and left the cave with a rover. I realized that above our cave there were 2 other people mining near it, and they had just left. I drove to the spot where they were mining, and then woke up.

Edited February 28, 2016 by The Flame Cat

It's clearly an omen.

You need to get into game development and design a new franchise that is basically a love child of Halo's shooting/driving mechanics combined with KSP's exploration/vehicle building.

Now go forth and do it so I can buy it!

38 minutes ago, Rocket In My Pocket said:

It's clearly an omen.

You need to get into game development and design a new franchise that is basically a love child of Halo's shooting/driving mechanics combined with KSP's exploration/vehicle building.

Now go forth and do it so I can buy it!

Already in game development, I am the founder of Ma5E, planning a game in which you build up a clan and build giant spaceships and explore, fight, or trade with them n stuff

so yeah, 

COINCIDENCE?

 

I

THINK

NOT!

Edit: Ma5E is brand new and we I haven't done anything with it, in fact even the name might be changed

Edited February 28, 2016 by The Flame Cat
Thread moved to the off-topic Lounge, since it's not about the game itself.

4 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

Thread moved to the off-topic Lounge, since it's not about the game itself. 

aight. It's somewhat related to KSP, so i thought maybe it was allowed in General KSP discussion. Sorry bout tht.
Well the Halo AR is called the MA5(a, b, c, or d), will your game include the MA5? And it better have a planet like Eve in it, because why not.

On 3/1/2016 at 0:43 AM, legoclone09 said:

Well the Halo AR is called the MA5(a, b, c, or d), will your game include the MA5? And it better have a planet like Eve in it, because why not.

Well, I'm thinking of implementing many homages to many games, and maybe a star system VERY similar to the Kerbal System.

I'm on my third KSP dream to date now, and they seem to represent stranger and more ambitious future editions of KSP every time.

The latest one appeared to be the 1.1 patch, but instead of a few new parts SQUAD surprised us with hundreds. Great, except that some of them included:
- 8.5m was the size standard for Size 4, making it incompatible with various mods.
- a 25m diameter circular probe core. What am I supposed to build with this?
- a probe core shaped like a short staircase. Again, bizarre and impractical.

1 minute ago, parameciumkid said:

The latest one appeared to be the 1.1 patch, but instead of a few new parts SQUAD surprised us with hundreds. Great, except that some of them included:

- a 25m diameter circular probe core. What am I supposed to build with this?
- a probe core shaped like a short staircase. Again, bizarre and impractical.

25m probe core.... im laughing for real
